known_issues: Error reported in app during Version 26 testing

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the data fetching issues preventing old orders from loading in the OrdersView component, specifically addressing the getAllOrders query implementation
Investigate and fix the data fetching issues preventing old repair orders from loading in the RepairOrdersView component, specifically addressing the getAllRepairOrders query implementation

Investigate and fix the data fetching issues preventing old service records (piercing and other services) from loading in their respective list views, specifically addressing the getAllPiercingServices and getAllOtherServices query implementations

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify and fix any backend query methods that may be returning incorrect data types or missing fields for orders, repair orders, and service records
Add comprehensive error logging and debugging output to identify the root cause of data loading failures across all list views

projectName: Debug and fix application error in Version 26
